page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT IN N.BRISTOL
page.content: {Southmead: }many of over- 16's unemployed,a level reflected by large % free scool meals.Little hope of employment for school leavers leads to social problems & depression,with solvent- abuse common.Many of employed work in the hospitals,pubs,local aerospace factory,while some work in city centre mainly in shops & service industries."Moonlighting" is common. {Westbury/Henbury:}unemployment not severe problem as relatively high % of skilled/semi-skilled & professions. {Largest group:}British Aerospace & Rolls-Royce engineers & office staff. {Others:}builders,craftsmen,mechanics, workers in offices,insurance companies & banks,the police & H.M.Services, doctors,civil-servants & teachers,with some self-employed.One self-help group established in Monks Park area (between Filton & Horfield).
